values:
Since people are becoming such effing crapfaces in my LJ, I made a new one.

New LJ

I finally got my pictures from camp developped along with some random photo's.  There's more from another disposible camarra comming soon, but for now... enjoi.

Sarah.

Pastor Jame's.... AKA   jujuju, J-UNIT.

Me, megano, Brittney, and Jade.

first scene, megano says something stupid.

second scene, I kick megano's ars.

Megano is a douche.

That's brittney, She's awsome to the max.

That's david, Ian, Mitch, and 2 random kids.

Jenna and Krista

This has to be pimp van of "Prince" it's so friggen banging.

That's collin, he reminded me of connor oberst so he was cool.

That's Brent, the gay guy that hit on me at camp, and his twin brother.

That dude is my new best friend from camp, sal.  He has to be my long lost brother, we are so much alike.  That's his ladie, alex, and next to them is brittney, one of the most rocking girls ever.

Jess! CVS totally effed a bunch of my pictures up.

Sal and Alex in a Romantic love scene.

Ryan = such a sped.

Would anyone want to bang you? by phobia
Name:
Favorite Food:
Wants to Bang you:
This many times:146
Quiz created with MemeGen!

So... I got back from church camp.  All I have to say is "friggen amazing."  I'd never expect in a million years that I would have became a christian, but hey.  I had the best time, I loved the awsome games, I got to pla moses in a skit and was named "EMOses" nice.  I got closer to Christian(with the big mokawk), megan, jenny, sara, and I made my new best friend, Sal.  I swear Sal is my long lost brother, I love that dude, he lives in NY.  My mom and I are going to drive up there before school starts and star with him for a week or so.  I also met his girlfriend Alex and her best friend Brittney.  When I got there we had these services and the band that played was banging, dude.  Then Wednessday night, I felt so comfortable with Sal and Megan, I broke down when everyone went up the the from and prayed and confessed and such.  Everytime something like that happend, Sal was there for me, as I was for him.  Thursday night, I was saved.  Then Friday night, the last night, we were told to find someone that we felt close to or had a burden with, and wash their feet.  Of course me and Sal did it, then we walked around the campus and talked.  He and I are like, exactly equal, same bands, same tastes.  That is one rad dude.  I was so upset to leave, I gave Sal my bandanna.  I can't wait to go see him.  Well, today I got up with Sammy and went to church, then went to the movies with Sam, Christian, David, Katy, Ryan, and Megano.  After that and youth group, I came home and chilled.  I have to leave tuesday morning to go to ohio until next Tuesday, fun.  I don't want to work tomorrow.  Everyone should come visit me, I'll be at the game stand.  Well it's bed time for sir roberto, goodevening.

I have yet to go to sleep and I am leaving in half an hour.  I get to go to a church camp in New York for a week, YAY, not really.  Megan is going so I'll have company, that little midget is cool.  Anywho, I couldn't sleep so I'm just going to sleep on the bus, I usually don't go to sleep untill now so I'm not used to going to bed earlier.  Well I just requested my layout and made a mix CD for the trip, so I'm going to eat some cerial and take a shower.  See you in a week.

Yeah so I'm a butt load of trouble.  My friggen parents read my LJ.  I'm not going to be doing much for a while, sucks.  Anywho, I worked today.  I sold quite a bit, then Erica and I hung out.  She's movie, and that = crap.  Well I'm bored, downloading music from bands I want to check out.  Some good stuff out there.  Well thats all for the moment.  peace

Well I woke up at... well early.  My alarm wouldn't stop going off and I guess I didn't hit the off switch.  I have to leave for work in a few minutes.  I should probably take a shower, I smell like sweat, ramen, and dirt, sexy eh'.  I got every Senses Fail guitar tab there is so I now know them all, fucking rad.  I'm happy now that I have my Marshall stack back in my garage, playing non-stop.  Well it's shower time for smelly Rob.

I don't get to update much anymore, I have non-stop work. My boss called me last night and told me I had to work. I guess he didn't want to work his shift and said that he made a missprint on hte schedule and put his name instead of mine... right. I hung out with this cool girl named courtney I met. She drove wtih me and Chris up to the satalites and we hung out up there. I have to go to work in a few, at 3:00 to be percise. Chris is still at my house. I'm going to take a shower so I can get up to the mall.

Yesterday was yet, another party. We woke up and greg went home. me and sam ate some breakfast then went to sara's and erica's. We stayed there for a few hours, then came home. We went to the mall and I got my hair cizzut, only like half an inch. Last night we partied untill like 7. so many people in sam's back yard. Then some girls got naked on my surfboard, everyone was shady's (sams brother) friends. So today I woke up with a bit of a hang over. Erica and sara came over so sam could get his mack on. Then I came home and slept. I called Chris and asked what he was up to, we ended up seeing a movie. We saw "Sleepover" I don't know why. Then after the movie, this black dude got arrested for beating up some 8th graders who had a gun. I would like to know... WHY DO 8TH GRADERS HAVE GUNS?!?! I felt badass when I got a lighter and a rock. Christ. I don't have to work untill Wednessday so I've been partying non-stop, and it's starting to hit me. If I have any more alchohol, I think I'll keel over. I am probably going with Chris and RJ tomorrow night to some party at geoffs, fun. That dude is hardcore. Well I need some food.

Yeah so I'm deffinitally mad, and I don't know why. I'm not going to boston, I don't know why. I'm over at Sammy's right now. I was supposed to go to scotts but he left. Greg came over as there was some smoking going on so he was excited. Then we ate a bunch and went swimming... IN THE NUDE fun. Greg and Sammy are asleep which is what I think I'm going to do.

I'm up late again, I'm going to pay at work tomorrow.  I was up untill just a few minutes ago on the phone with Erica for 3 hours.  No someone's mad at me for a false reason.  I finally got our band practice photo's up on here.

Work wasn't so bad today.  Juliane came up around 215 and I took my break and walked with her.  Then she hung out with me untill I got off work and we walked for a few minutes.  I made her a big "J" necklace with the gold, haha.  I have to leave Friday morning to go to boston for a funeral of my great grandmother.  I want to take pictures but that sounds so... sick.  I mean it would be a cool place for photo's, but pictures at a funeral is really wierd.  I'm going to hell.  I get to sit at home and clean my room all night.  I'm hoping someone might call, but I doubt it.  I think I'm going to get started. I think I'm also going to get a burrito.
Oh man I'm so tired, I was up so late last night/this morning.  I am getting ready to leave for work.  Juliane is going to try and come up, pimp.  I have to run the stand myself today.  I'mm off.

Man, I'm going to be so tired tomorrow, I have to wake up at 9 to go to work.  I work untill 430.  Me, Matt, and Devon are going to start a band together, it shall rule.  We want to play the most memorable show in waldorf, it's a suprise, maybe I'll tell one day.  I love the new band off Victory Records, "Hawthorne Heights" They = rad.  Well juliane went to bed so I think I will too.

I look MAD.

I decided to take a picture on my way out...

And another.

AAAAAAAAAHHHH!!!!

That's a tired robert.

I look like cousin it.

Oh man, long time no update. I got back from VA beach saturday. Sunday I had to work, then shot fireworks. Then I went with Chris and RJ to a bunch of parties. Then we went to this guy Jeffs house with CHAZ, josh, Shirley cruz, Hiedi rice, Tara and kyle, then like 3 others I didn't know. We got trashed over there. Then I woke up Monday with a hang over. I worked and then did nothing. Tonight I went to the mall and now I'm hanging out with megan from next door. I got a new phone, and i730. I get service for it tomorrow, yay. Ryan, holden, anne, and I went up on the satalites today and skated. I think we are going to find some way to play a concert inside the satalite, that would RULE!!!. God if we pulled that off, we would go down in history. Who knows. I have to work tomorrow, fun. My boss is in jail for being caught with eccstasy, oh man, Hardcore. Me and john jones were saying how that could have been us hanging out with him, haha. I couldn't imagine my parents face if they found me in jail for eccstacy, I don't do that crap anymore though. Well I'm going to try and upload these pictures without my camara dieing.

1heart_2peices's LJ stalker is chicken_poo!
chicken_poo is stalking you because you made a nasty comment on their LJ. They are also stalking the rest of your friends list!

LiveJournal Username:

LJ Stalker Finder
From Go-Quiz.com That's hot, <3

Yea, so my computer doesn't work.  The internet has been effed up for a few weeks so I haven't updated since school was still in.  Alot has happend.  I have a girlfriend, Brittney.  She's awsome to the max.  I went to see Blink and No Doubt with Ryan, and we saw scott there.  Tom Delonge pointed at me and I almost jizzumed.  Then I saw Megan in line at the4 T-shirt stand.  I also saw Danielle and her assho... I mean boyfriend.  Her mom kissed me, that was funny like woah.  Then my mom was stuck in traffic so Ryan and I were waiting for like 3 hours after the show.  Then we had to just walk down the dark froad to meet her at 7-11.  Interesting show.  I also went to the Dashboard Confessional show with Danielle.  A little wierd but fun, I saw Martin there.  I also saw Josh kelly there with 4 ladies, pimp josh pimp.  Now I'm in Va beach with Ryan.  We've been here at my dads house since sunday night.  Ryan wont go on the beach, he's afraid, shit face.  I go out there by myself and surf.  I got another board from a pawn shop for $150.  Awsome deal.  Brittney is at Cheerleading Camp untill Saturday, thats the same day we get back.  We found out my dads new girlfriend is a 26 year old model and ryan and I both think shes hot, daddy = PIMP.  We got to eat at hooters last night, I could live there.  there is slot of detail I left out about my past weeks, but thats the highlights.  I am going to wake Ryan up because I want to go do something.

Friday Got caught skipping at school by Mrs. Goldberg (bitch). Man I hate that woman. I'm deffinitally getting her house somehow. So I was grounded so I went into work, came home and hung out on the computer. Saturday Went to work untill 2 and then went to Dani's party. We didn't play untill late. We couldn't get in touch with Holden so it was just me and ryan, but we played a little. I got home around 1 and got bitched at for being like 4 hours late. Sunday Woke up and got ready for work. I had to work at the ping pong stand, blew. Me and Remmy (co worker) only got like 5 sales. I went to youth group and hung out with Megan the whole time. Then I came home and got a bit "tipsy". I'm deffinitally cutting down. I'm waiting a while before I drink again. Then Danielle called and asked if I wanted to go to take her friend home with her. eh'. Wanted to and yet not. I went. I came home and am now talking with my mom about possibly divorcing my stepdad. (crossing fingers) Now I'm thinking about what/when I'm going to talk to the someone. Who knows. Well I'm needing to finish some learning of HTML's.

I had to wake up for school today, that = unfun. There was a rumor going around which sucked because it gave someone the wrong impression of me. I got it straitend out though so it's all gravy. I went to work and made $80, score. I'm being trained to be a manager. I'm going to be making loads and loads of cizzash. I just got home because I had to close by myself and it took about 2 hours. Not fun at all. Now I'm trying to figure out what to say, not quite preparing a speech, but basically. I need to talk to... someone. I'm hoping for the best. Well I'm going to continue listening to my soulful sounds of Bright Eyes.

Graduation was today, I stayed home. I went over to Megans after she got home for her "gathering" of friends. Then I went up to the mall to meet Weston and Lauren. We hung out for about 2 hours, I bought her underwear for her birthday, hardy har. Yea those to need like a private room to follow them around, I felt like I was in a porno. I followed feeling very lonely. Then Lauren left, so Weston and I looked around. I got 2 cool shirts from AE, I don't care what people say, they have good stuff. Then I got some Compact Disks. I got Bright Eyes, Autopilot Off, and a Ferret Records compalation. Then we went and saw "Day after tomorrow" I'm not afraid that the world is ending. That movie deffinitally rocked my socks. So now I have to go to bed. Goodevening.

I saw no purpose in going to school today. We sat around and did absolutly NOTHING. I got up this morning and had a bunch of shots. I ended up drunk by the time I got to school. Lauren helped me throughout 1st and 2nd period, then I skiped with her and went to 5th period lunch so I was good by then. Man, I don't remember much. I don't really care anymore, why should I be sober, honestly. I want a ciggerette so bad because everyone I know has them and I haven't in so long. I keep needing some relief. Yesterday was some, even though I had to work. I met Brittney at the mall around noon and we walked around. Then we went and saw "Soul Plane" that movie = awsome to the max. Brittney's a cool girl and I do believe I'm fond of her. That was mostly my highlight of the day. I'm online trying to find a wetsuit for the surf comp. in VA beach in a few weeks. Tis going to rule all. Well I made $70 tonight at work, so I = happy/unpoor. I like this Amberlin CD I'm listening to though, I truly do. Well I'm going to continue. PTFO

Holy crap!  I just got home from hanging out with Nate and Matt, the 2 guys staying with us for the summer.  They had fireworks from tennessee and we wanted to find somewhere to shoot them off so we went to the satalites.  We went up in the big dish and shot bottle rockets and roman candles off of it.  That was deffinitally loud and probably woke a bunch of people up.  Well now I'm tired from running to the car when we heard people.  I have work tomorrow at 11-5.  I'm going to continue my training on wire necklace name things.  People should come visit me.  I'll either be at made for you, or over at the ping pong stand next to the elevator.  Well I'm off to sleep.

Today was fun at work, I got to do the "Made for you" stand.  I'm able to make the belt buckles with names on them now, PIMP.  I'm learning to make the cursive name of wire nacklace things, those are hard as crap.  I spent like an hour trying to make them, it's going to take a week or so.  Once I learn to make those, I will get $10 - $12 and hour + commision.  This job rules to the max.  I work with John Jones so I have someone to work with that I know.  He started a day before me.  After I got off work I saw ashley, so we hung out.  Then I brought her home with me and we went to John Bassetts party thing.  We played and ashley watched us, T'was fun.  Now I'm madly bored.

So yea I'm getting ready to go off to work.   These guys are here, we're taking them in.  They are college students from CA that have a summer job to go here and sell these book things, they're cool.  There's Nate, Matt, and Brian.  Nate surfs and Brian's just a party animal kind of guy.  They are staying with us untill the end of August.  They like all the same bands I like Starting Line, Amberlin, postal service, aw to the some.  Well I'm off to work.

I just got home from first day at work. I went there at 3 and learned everything quick. Since I get paid everyday, I got $30 today, good stuff. I sold 4 game system things. Matt, Nate, and Curtis from Monroe all came up and hungout with me for a bit. Curtis was high and tripping out over the ping pong game. I found out that John Jones works there too, he started yesterday. I work Saturday, very easy job. I'm going to My Brothers Place tomorrow. We need to have band practice so hopefully we can do that tomorrow before MBP. We're playing Dani's party on the 5th. EVERYONE GO It shall be our first show. Well I need rest for the final day of testing.

I had to get out of school today because I didn't do my english projecy.  I was going to take pictures for scenes from "Romeo & Juliet" but Sam was busy and megan could do it so I have to wait and do it for extra credit later.  So my mom was picking me up and taking me to lunch during 5th period.  We went to the mall and I was buying plugs for my lip at the ear ring place in front of cinabons called "Made for you" and I asked the guy if he was hiring.  His exact words were "Yea, can you start tonight?"  I told him I could tomorrow.  He also owns the kiosk stand next to the elevator with the ping pong thing, that is where I start for hte first 2 weeks.  The pay is awsome, I get 15% of what I sell for hte first week.  Then depending on how much I sell in that time determines my official salary + 7% of what I sell.  YAY.  The job requires little work, which I like.  Everyone should come by and say hi to me when they get the chance.  I work... Thursday 3-930, Saturday 7-5, Sunday 11-5, Monday & Tuesday 3-930.  I get pay in cash to since it's a private owned business so that is cool.  Finally a job I might acctually like.  Sammy has plans this weekend so I might not get to see her, hmm.  She may be free saturday so when I get off work, we may go do something.  I guess I'm going to My Brothers Place Friday and Ryans comming over or I'm going there or something.  I want to go swimming over there.  Well I'm going to go make a colloge for my english project of romantic stuff like Romeo & Juliet "ish".

Well I'm going to try to sum the past few days an "organized" summary...

Friday

Got very bored sitting at home so I decided to go to My Brothers Place.  Sam was grounded so I couldn't see her, It = gay.  So I went and hung out with Ryan.  The bands were slright, I haven't seen level 8 in a while so it was cool.  They put on a decent show that I enjoyed.  Little sam came home and spent the night with me.

Saturday

I got up and found out that Stefan and Alex and everyone already left so I called Ryan and got him to go with me.  We got to HFStival at like 1, we took Metro there.  We bought our tickets and like right as we got there, we saw danielle, she was there with her family.  We walked around a bit, I went to mash and crowed surf durring Yellowcard.  Right as I went in I got hit in the finger and now I have it in a bandage because it's fractured.  I migled alot.  Saw some good bands.  Highlight was NFG, friggen great show, got into a fight during it though with some kid that pushed me away and tried to take my spot in the front of the crowd.  I don't play when it comes to music.  I found cammy later on and hung out with her while Ryan talked to Danielle's sister and Danielle and her boytoy danced to jay-Z.  Me and her went down with her friends during offspring, good show.  Then I found Ryan before the Cure.  That show RULED, but we had to leave ot catch metro.  It took like an hour to get through the lines at the Metro station, then we forgot to call my mom so we hung outside Branch Avenue for like and hour, Scurry.  Then we called a bunch of people while we waited, haha. 

Sunday

Went to skate for the tryouts for owens.  I doubt I made it, I hade a fractured finger that kept messing up my concentration, gay.  I went to the hospital and got it bandaged, fun.  I talked to sam when I got home, she did awsome to the max at her dance competition. 

Now I'm getting ready to go skate because my fingers are tired.

Arg, I hate school.  I slept through all of my classes.  I didn't get to talk to sammy today, sad.  Ryan and I went to the chorus concert at westlake, video taped Martin.  Then Dani wanted me to go to IHOP, so I went with him.  I got a free sunde' and fries.  I'm trying to decide whether I should call sammy.  I am eager to talk to her ♥ but I don't want to wake her.  Man,I am very fond of that girl.  I do beleive things are hopefully going places, we just need to spend more time together (of course thats what left me single).  I need to talk to her, hopefully tomorrow we can.  Between the band, and school, I = no time, but I'm deffenitaly pushing alot of that aside, I don't do anything at school anyway.  I really want things to work out.  I've made somewhat of a new friend, jamie.  The guy who used to hate me, but he's one swell fellow.  Well I'm just going to go write the continuous letter I have been writing to sam for the past week or so.  
Bert + S♥M = a whole lotta pimp

Yesterday I mostly had an extra long, dull day. I went skating with stefan up at the skatepark, then went to Owens to talk to ashley. After that, I came home, wow I need a seatbelt for this rollercoaster ride I call a life. I have detention next tuesday, that = gay. Danielle was talking to me and stuff like that and Ms Washington kept yelling at us to move and I told her to hold on and even after I walked away the woman followed me and told me to get to class. I, already being kind of pissed from present events, yelled at her to "Shut the fuck up, god whats your problem" Needless to say, I was in trouble. It was funny because Mr. Newcomb agreed with me that she was a dumb biatch. poop. I was up until like 2 last night. I wrote a letter to someone I can't stop thinking about, ♥. Today I have band practice, yay, we need to work on another song I wrote and one I'm in the process of writting. Well I'm off for another exciting day of sleeping through my classes and yelling at teachers.

Yesterday was alot of testing, I fell asleep in alot of classes. I get to do the same today!!! I Have to do a bunch of projects. I'm taking pictures of scenes for my "Romeo & Juliet" project in english, then editing them. Guess whom is my Juliet♥. We got to pick what we wanted to do so I'm taking these pictures then making them look very very pimp with some photoshop & some help from my Juliet. I also am puttingon our play for theater today. I have my gree blazer and tight black dress shirt, and my dickies pants. I'm going to rule that stage like a motherbitch. Well Alex is on his way I do believe so I'm going to have fun

Big big weekend. Friday, I went skating with Brett, Brian, and Jack. We determind that cayla's dad is having an affair, her and her mom were gone and a black car pulled acrossed the street for like 10 minutes until a woman got up and went into the house, hmmm. Then I went to MBP and 9 and watched Jamies band play, very nice. after I figured out that it was pointless to wait and that I was dieing to, I asked out sammy. She said "No... I'm kidding, yes" what a bizzotch. I went to ryans around 1030 and spent the night, we went swimming, and anne came over. We made a bunch of songs. We plan to play at MBP at the next available show, and dani's party on the 5th, EVERYONE COME. Saturday Ryan holden and I woke up and played alot more, and swam, and played, and swam, and played more. Then we went up to the mall for a few hours. We cause some mischief. Then we came back to my house and practiced. Yesterday we got up and played even more, then went over to find cayla. She was at mat's house and we got her to come to her house with us. We ate her food, and talked about her mother. We started keeping her camara away from her so she owuld come to our house to hear us play. Mat got mad and told his daddy on us. His dad and his friends jogged up and threatend us, then cayla made us look like assholes and didn't come with us. DOUCHE. Then I went to youth group with ryan and sammy. Pimping. Ryan spent the night and we got up today. He came home and we wrote music, got very bored. We went up and watched "Mean Girls" So now I am talking on the phone with s♥m. She = playing dress up, hardy har. Well I'm going to bed.

SO SO bored. I spent today sitting around. In 8th period my ball in my lip ring came out so I had to run by "Ink Junkies" to get that taken care of. Then I came home and went to cayla's. Then austin pulled up in a New car. Austins like 3rd car in the past month. bastard. Now I'm waiting for my laundry to finish. Tomorrow night I'm going to MBP and like 10 and then going home with Ryan so we can practice. We're playing at the McDonough talent show on the 7th. poop I = bored now, I'm talking to sam and eating oatmeal cream pies. I need a life. I do think it might be too late to go skate so I believe I'm in for the night. Well I'm going to continue a conversation with Samantha before I die of dullness. PtFo

We had a half day, well for me it was like a half of a half day. I left after 4th period, with KB and Ashley. We drove over to KB's house and found out his mom's car got broken into. We hung out over there for about an hour. KB needed to get ready for work so ashley and I left and went to food lion then target. We have something planned for tonight, shhh. I got home around 1:45 and Sammy came over. We hung out and danced for a while. Sammy wont eat a Veggie chicken patty, damn. One day she will. I got my house coned again last night for the third time. Ashley got her car saran wrapped for the second night in a row last night too. Funny how it sounds like the same people, hmm. Well revenge is very sweet. After we took sammy home, I came home and slept, then skateboarded. I also just realized that I have alot of homework but hey, I haven't done homework since around December. I don't plan to start now. I'm passing and thats all that matters. Well I'm hungry, still, and am going to go eat. ♥5-14♥

I went skating today in LaPlata with stefan for like 5 hours.  That ruled.  I was so friggen tired though.  I came home and wanted to skate some more though so I went to BJ's and skated for a while.  I can't wait for tomorrow.  We have half a day, and I'm doing almost nothing in all of my classes yay.  Well I'm off to bed.  Oh yeah, Chuck and someothers coned my house last night, fuckers.

AAHHHH! I have to go to school, I really don't want to.  It's been to long, I think I missed a few assesments.  I am going to have mad amounts of makeup work.  The good news is that we only have like 10 more days, thank god.  No joke, I really really would love it if the school blew up right before we got there today.  Like it may be a bad thing to say but I would have to laugh, alot.  Well I'm eating my cheerios and then I'm going to sit and wait for Fop becuase I really have nothing else to do this morning, and I'm trying not to fall back asleep.

Today I went to sam's. well acctualy I stayed home from school and ate food, then went to sams. Very fun time ♥, and I got to see sam rollerblade. We made candy apples that didn't turn out quite right, NOT MY FAULT. Then we just hung out, watched ninja turtles. Over all it was quite a fun afternoon. I get to go back to school tomorrow, I have alot of makeup work to do. I've missed 4 days strait. I have a doctors note. Then in a few weeks I have to go to boston for a funeral so I get to miss another 3 days. How I ever am going to pass is beyond me. Well I'm trying to make plans for this weekend so I can tell my mom because I don't want to have to clean house, which is what I know they are planning. I want to take sammy to the movies friday for some perticular reason. If not friday, then saturday. If we go saturday, then I do believe I'm going to Alex's for some drinking on friday. If we go friday, then hey, it's more fun then getting trashed. I think I want to do my hair in a mohawk tomorrow if I can get it to stay, lots of wax. I'm going to try. Well BERT = tired so I'm off to bed. ♥

I got pictures of Sam and I on the day we went to the satalites.  We made pimping emo t shirts because thats how cool we are.  Take a gander.

T-thirt making rules

emo shirt

This is sanchez, my desk buddy

EMO EMO EMO EMO EMO

EMO II

only cool kids make their own T-shirts

Yay I finally put up the pictures of me and sammy when we went to the satalites a while back, enjoy.

Sammy looks like she's on the Titanic

Some wierd tower

An empty room

BERT so emo

I decided to climb one of the towers

Sammy wanted to climb as well

This place is pimp

Sammy is afraid and running... from something.

SAMMY IS A PIMP

The jail.

Sammy so emo.

There are alot of empty rooms at the satalites

Random tower

This place was creepy

Chair

Yesterday was long, but fun.  I got up and layed around the house for a bit.  Then I finally took a shower and went up to the mall for a little bit.  I little sammy up there with his ladies.  He walked around with me for a while.  Then I went down to the theater to meet sammy to see "Mean Girls"  It was a decent movie, I enjoyed it.  Then we had some time to spare and we needed mothersday gifts so we headed over to the mall.  We couldn't think of anything to get, and the line for card stores were like 30 people so that was out of the question.  We are to cool for lines.  Sam went and got her mother a book.  I found nothing so I made a card and wrote a poem.  It got to be like 9 and we were eating and sam remebered that travis was supposed to bring her pizza so she tried to contact him.  We went down to the movies because her brother was there.   We ended up staying for another movie. "New York Minute"  That as well was not a bad movie.  There was no one in the theater until right as the movie started, it would have been alot cooler if the theater was fully empty.  Afterwards, my step-dad gave sam a ride home.  Very fun night, very fun company ♥.  well today I'm bored and have to much of a sun burn to go outside, so I'm just going to enjoy my day of tv.  FUN.  Tomorrow I'm not looking forward to school.  PTFO, <3.

last night I watched the final episode of friends, sad sad. Then I went outside because I heard either alexs', or mikes car. I came out and found 32 cones in my front yard. Bastards, I'll get them back. figuring that all of the cones stay in RK's backyard, I'm sure he had something to do with it. Then I came upstairs and played on the computer for a while and slept. Today I stayed home yet again from school, I did feel alot better though. I ended up mowning the lawn from like 11:30 until 4:00. Then my step-dad and I took my mom out for mothersday (he has to work sunday). I, by the way, got very very very bad sunburn. I went to my brothers place with it, such pain. We met this band from Fredricks called "fly or die" excelent band, cool guys. We hung out with them the entire night. Then sammy and lindsey and juliane had to leave so it was just me and mike and doug (the drummer and bassist). We talked until about 12 and then they gave me a ride home. Fun night. Then I got home and found out some really nice news <3. Now I'm sitting here putting some lotion stuff on my horrific sunburn. my entire back burns so friggen bad. Well I'm going to sleep so this pain ends for now (emo line). I'm getting up early to help for a yardsale and then to the mall. <3
